com.aionemu.commons.scripting.impl.javacompiler
Class ClassFileManager

java.lang.Object
  javax.tools.ForwardingJavaFileManager<javax.tools.JavaFileManager>
      com.aionemu.commons.scripting.impl.javacompiler.ClassFileManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, javax.tools.JavaFileManager, javax.tools.OptionChecker
public class ClassFileManager
extends javax.tools.ForwardingJavaFileManager<javax.tools.JavaFileManager>

This class extends manages loaded classes. It is also responsible for tricking compiler. Unfortunally compiler doen't work with classloaders, so we have to pass class data manually for each compilation.

Author:
SoulKeeper

list

public java.lang.Iterable<javax.tools.JavaFileObject> list(javax.tools.JavaFileManager.Location location,
                                                           java.lang.String packageName,
                                                           java.util.Set<javax.tools.JavaFileObject.Kind> kinds,
                                                           boolean recurse)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
This method overrides class resolving procedure for compiler. It uses classloaders to resolve classes that compiler may need during compilation. Compiler by itself can't detect them. So we have to use this hack here. Hack is used only if compiler requests for classes in classpath.

Specified by:
list in interface javax.tools.JavaFileManager
Overrides:
list in class javax.tools.ForwardingJavaFileManager<javax.tools.JavaFileManager>
Parameters:
location - Location to search classes
packageName - package to scan for classes
kinds - FileTypes to search
recurse - not used
Returns:
list of requered files
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if something foes wrong
